Hayward.Union Landing Shopping Center: Union Landing Shopping Center is an open air shopping mall in the 100-acre redevelopment Dyer Triangle in Union City, California, adjacent to Interstate 880, between Alvarado-Niles Road and Dyer Street and the largest shopping center in the city. The majority of this area was occupied by Union City Drive-In Theater between 1966 and 1998. The Center has two large Pylon signs near 880 and is in the process in the future to be rebranded by City Of Union City.
